feed.title: Security Advisory for PHP packages hosted at packagist.org
feed.subtitle: Security Advisory for PHP packages hosted at packagist.org on GitHub

entry.title: [joomla/joomla-cms] Joomla! Cross-site Scripting vulnerability
entry.content:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in libraries/idna_convert/example.php in Joomla! 3.1.5 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the lang parameter.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2013-5583
  • https://github.com/joomla/joomla-cms/commit/c00c033d33d901e1ca6be9061a44e55acd041b1f
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20130810034709/http://disse.cting.org/2013/08/05/joomla-core-3_1_5_reflected-xss-vulnerability
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20130810103125/http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/61600
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-5xmg-w578-gq5j

entry.title: [sjbr/static-info-tables] Static Info Tables (static_info_tables) extension TYPO3 vulnerable to Cross-site Scripting
entry.content:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Static Info Tables (static_info_tables) extension before 2.3.1 for TYPO3 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2013-5323
  • https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/82212
  • http://typo3.org/extensions/repository/view/static_info_tables
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20130425011655/http://typo3.org/teams/security/security-bulletins/typo3-extensions/typo3-ext-sa-2013-004
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20200229090743/http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/58056
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-6p8h-36qp-8h72

entry.title: [bednee/cooluri] CoolURI extension for TYPO3 vulnerable to SQL Injection
entry.content:
SQL injection vulnerability in the CoolURI extension before 1.0.30 for TYPO3 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via unspecified vectors.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2013-5322
  • https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/82213
  • http://typo3.org/extensions/repository/view/cooluri
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20131204041535/http://typo3.org/teams/security/security-bulletins/typo3-extensions/typo3-ext-sa-2013-003
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20131211015313/http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/58055
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-r3rw-h5v8-ff6h

entry.title: [jambagecom/div2007] Static Methods since 2007 (div2007) extension for TYPO3 vulnerable to Cross-site Scripting
entry.content:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Static Methods since 2007 (div2007) extension before 0.10.2 for TYPO3 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors, related to the t3lib_div::quoteJSvalue function.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2013-5100
  • https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/81195
  • http://typo3.org/extensions/repository/view/div2007
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20130314000411/http://typo3.org/teams/security/security-bulletins/typo3-extensions/typo3-ext-sa-2013-001
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20130815054813/http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/57288
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-4mm3-xgc2-656r

entry.title: [moodle/moodle] YUI Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability
entry.content:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in flashuploader.swf in the Uploader component in Yahoo! YUI 3.5.0 through 3.9.1, as used in Moodle through 2.1.10, 2.2.x before 2.2.11, 2.3.x before 2.3.8, 2.4.x before 2.4.5, 2.5.x before 2.5.1, and other products, allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a crafted string in a URL.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2013-4942
  • https://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=232496
  • http://git.moodle.org/gw?p=moodle.git&a=search&h=HEAD&st=commit&s=MDL-39678
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20130909203912/http://yuilibrary.com/support/20130515-vulnerability
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-9ww8-j8j2-3788

entry.title: [moodle/moodle] YUI Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability
entry.content:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in uploader.swf in the Uploader component in Yahoo! YUI 3.2.0 through 3.9.1, as used in Moodle through 2.1.10, 2.2.x before 2.2.11, 2.3.x before 2.3.8, 2.4.x before 2.4.5, 2.5.x before 2.5.1, and other products, allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a crafted string in a URL.

entry.title: [moodle/moodle] YUI Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability
entry.content:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in io.swf in the IO Utility component in Yahoo! YUI 3.10.2, as used in Moodle through 2.1.10, 2.2.x before 2.2.11, 2.3.x before 2.3.8, 2.4.x before 2.4.5, 2.5.x before 2.5.1, and other products, allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a crafted string in a URL. NOTE: this vulnerability exists because of a CVE-2013-4939 regression.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2013-4940
  • https://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=232496
  • http://git.moodle.org/gw?p=moodle.git&a=search&h=HEAD&st=commit&s=MDL-39678
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20130909203912/http://yuilibrary.com/support/20130515-vulnerability
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-x5hj-47vv-53p8

entry.title: [georgringer/news] News system (news) extension for TYPO3 vulnerable to SQL Injection
entry.content:
SQL injection vulnerability in the News system (news) extension before 1.3.3 for TYPO3 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via unspecified vectors.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2013-4748
  • https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/81192
  • http://typo3.org/extensions/repository/view/news
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20130214093535/http://typo3.org/teams/security/security-bulletins/typo3-extensions/typo3-ext-sa-2013-001
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-rg6g-v4xm-g49q

entry.title: [oliverklee/phpunit] PHPUnit extension for TYPO3 vulnerable to Cross-site Scripting
entry.content:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the PHPUnit extension before 3.5.15 for TYPO3 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2013-4744
  • https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/81194
  • http://typo3.org/extensions/repository/view/phpunit
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20130129050219/http://typo3.org/teams/security/security-bulletins/typo3-extensions/typo3-ext-sa-2013-001
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-c5x3-gq36-prrp

entry.title: [bvbmedia/multishop] Multishop extension for TYPO3 has SQL Injection vulnerability
entry.content:
SQL injection vulnerability in the Multishop extension before 2.0.39 for TYPO3 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via unspecified vectors.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2013-4682
  • http://typo3.org/extensions/repository/view/multishop
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20130701223430/http://typo3.org/teams/security/security-bulletins/typo3-extensions/typo3-ext-sa-2013-009-1
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20200229092533/http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/60271
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-v4fw-fh5c-xvjg

entry.title: [b13/seo_basics] Basic SEO Features (seo_basics) extension TYPO3 vulnerable to Cross-site Scripting
entry.content:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Basic SEO Features (seo_basics) extension before 0.8.2 for TYPO3 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2012-5888
  • https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/74483
  • http://forge.typo3.org/issues/35532
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20120709063251/http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/52772
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20120711210745/http://typo3.org/teams/security/security-bulletins/typo3-extensions/typo3-ext-sa-2012-006
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-7p53-8wjr-j8h4
